overview: Akin Ang Buhok Ko follows the story of Juan, a 9-year-old kid, who simply wants to keep his long hair against the wishes of the adults around him. When his father finds out that Juan skips classes to evade a mandatory haircut in school, he promises to cut his childâ€™s hair himself. All the while, Juan, together with his best friend, devises a plan to escape their homes.
title: My Hair Is Mine
